## Project Overview
This project is a Next.js portfolio website with a "Blue Portal/Spaceship" sci-fi theme.
It uses Tailwind CSS for styling, Framer Motion for animations, and React Three Fiber for the 3D background scene.

### Key Features
- **Theme:** Deep Space Blue (#020410) & Cyan (#00f0ff)
- **3D Scene:** Interactive Blue Portal with rotating rings and particles.
- **Hero Section:** "EXPLORE MY UNIVERSE" with system status badges.
- **Navigation:** Sci-fi themed navbar with "Ship", "A. Systems", etc.
- **Portfolio:** "Mission Logs" style project cards.
- **About:** "Pilot Profile" section.
- **Contact:** "Ready to Launch?" section.
